name: zzZ (evilc00kie)
description:
Ohh you're having a hard time falling asleep? You need to calm down, you know!
Did you already tried counting sheeps? Let's do it!

Controls

Play with your mouse. Pause with or .

Credits

- Music & FX: Noisetäter
